intro: Clutia × hybrida, commonly known as the hybrid clutia, is a flowering plant belonging to the Malvaceae family. It is characterized by its soft, fuzzy leaves and clusters of small, showy flowers that range in color from white to pink. The plant is native to tropical regions of Africa and thrives in warm, humid climates. It is often cultivated for its ornamental value and is used in traditional medicine in some cultures. Clutia × hybrida is a low-maintenance plant that prefers well-drained soil and partial to full sunlight.
